verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u Then came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all שִׁבְטֵ֧י <S%H7626><s%> shiv-Tei all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid to David חֶבְר֑וֹנָה <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ro-nah; unto Hebron וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and spake לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying הִנְנ֛וּ <S%H2005><s%> hin-Nu behold עַצְמְךָ֥ <S%H6106><s%> 'atz-me-Cha Behold we [are] thy bone וּֽבְשָׂרְךָ֖ <S%H1320><s%> u-ve-sa-re-Cha and thy flesh אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Na-che-nu. ourselves

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- again אֶתְמ֣וֹל <S%H865><s%> et-Mol before time גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- again שִׁלְשׁ֗וֹם <S%H8032><s%> shil-Shom, before that time בִּהְי֨וֹת <S%H1961><s%> bih-Yot become שָׁא֥וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul when Saul מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech was king עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu, over אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah, you; הָיִיתָה ha-yi-tah כהָיִ֛יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ta become ק; מֹוצִיא mo-tzi כהַמֹּוצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> ham-mo-Tzi after ק; וְהַמֵּבִי ve-ham-me-vi כוְהַמֵּבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> ve-ham-me-Vi abide קאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; Israel וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD לְךָ֗ le-Cha, אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You תִרְעֶ֤ה <S%H7462><s%> tir-'Eh to thee Thou shalt feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi my people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel וְאַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh will be a לְנָגִ֖יד <S%H5057><s%> le-na-Gid and thou shalt be a captain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. over Israel

וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> Vai-ya-vo-'u came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all זִקְנֵ֨י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei So all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech to the king חֶבְר֔וֹנָה <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ro-nah, to Hebron וַיִּכְרֹ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> vai-yich-Rot made לָהֶם֩ la-Hem הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech and king דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David בְּרִ֛ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit a league בְּחֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> be-chev-Ron with them in Hebron לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וַיִּמְשְׁח֧וּ <S%H4886><s%> vai-yim-she-Chu and they anointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. over Israel פ Peh

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim [was] thirty שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> be-ma-le-Cho; when he began to reign אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years מָלָֽךְ׃ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach. [and] he reigned

בְּחֶבְרוֹן֙ <S%H2275><s%> be-chev-rOn In Hebron מָלַ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach he reigned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, over Judah שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' seven שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim years וְשִׁשָּׁ֣ה <S%H8337><s%> ve-shish-Shah and six חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H2320><s%> cho-da-Shim; months וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <S%H3389><s%> u-vi-ru-sha-Lim and in Jerusalem מָלַ֗ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach, he reigned שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim thirty וְשָׁלֹשׁ֙ <S%H7969><s%> ve-sha-Losh and three שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El over all Israel וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah. and Judah

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech And the king וַֽאֲנָשָׁיו֙ <S%H376><s%> va-'a-na-Shav and his men יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-Ru-sha-Lim, to Jerusalem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against הַיְבֻסִ֖י <S%H2983><s%> hay-vu-Si unto the Jebusites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev the inhabitants הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the land וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer which spake לְדָוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid unto David לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- cannot תָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo thou shalt not come in הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah, here כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo הֱסִֽירְךָ֗ <S%H5493><s%> he-si-re-Cha, Except thou take away הַעִוְרִ֤ים <S%H5787><s%> ha-'iv-Rim the blind וְהַפִּסְחִים֙ <S%H6452><s%> ve-hap-pis-Chim halt לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, hither thinking לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- cannot יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo cannot come in דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah. here

וַיִּלְכֹּ֣ד <S%H3920><s%> vai-yil-Kod took דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, Nevertheless David אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et מְצֻדַ֣ת <S%H4686><s%> me-tzu-Dat the strong hold צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon; of Zion הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> hi that עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir the same [is] the city דָּוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid. of David

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom on that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- Whoever מַכֵּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> mak-Keh and smiteth יְבֻסִי֙ <S%H2983><s%> ye-vu-Si the Jebusites וְיִגַּ֣ע <S%H5060><s%> ve-yig-Ga' Whosoever getteth up בַּצִּנּ֔וֹר <S%H6794><s%> batz-tzin-Nor, to the gutter וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַפִּסְחִים֙ <S%H6455><s%> hap-pis-Chim and the lame וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַ֣עִוְרִ֔ים <S%H5787><s%> ha-'iv-Rim, and the blind; שְׂנֹאו se-nov כשְׂנֻאֵ֖י <S%H8130><s%> se-nu-'Ei enemy קנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh soul דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; of David's עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> ken after that יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru, [he shall be chief and captain] Wherefore they said עִוֵּ֣ר <S%H5787><s%> 'iv-Ver The blind וּפִסֵּ֔חַ <S%H6455><s%> u-fis-Se-ach, and the lame לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not יָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo shall not come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit. into the house

וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev dwelt דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid So David בַּמְּצֻדָ֔ה <S%H4686><s%> bam-me-tzu-Dah, in the fort וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-ra- and called לָ֖הּ lah עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir it the city דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; of David וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven built דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, round about מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַמִּלּ֖וֹא <S%H4407><s%> ham-mil-Lo from Millo וָבָֽיְתָה׃ <S%H1004><s%> va-Va-ye-tah. and inward

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech on דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David הָל֣וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Loch greater וְגָד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ve-ga-Dol; and grew great וַיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo. with פ Peh

וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <S%H7971><s%> Vai-yish-lach sent חִירָ֨ם <S%H2438><s%> chi-Ram And Hiram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king צֹ֥ר <S%H6865><s%> tzor of Tyre מַלְאָכִים֮ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִד֒ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid to David וַעֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> va-'a-Tzei trees אֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H730><s%> 'a-ra-Zim, and cedar וְחָרָשֵׁ֣י <S%H2796><s%> ve-cha-ra-Shei and carpenters עֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'Etz, trees וְחָֽרָשֵׁ֖י <S%H2796><s%> ve-cha-ra-Shei artificer אֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> 'E-ven stones קִ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> Kir; mason וַיִּבְנֽוּ־ <S%H1129><s%> vai-yiv-nu- and they built בַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> Va-yit an house לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. David

וַיֵּ֣דַע <S%H3045><s%> vai-Ye-da' perceived דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And David כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הֱכִינ֧וֹ <S%H3559><s%> he-chi-No had established יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech him king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; over Israel וְכִי֙ <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi for נִשֵּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> nis-Se and that he had exalted מַמְלַכְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4467><s%> mam-lach-To, his kingdom בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> ba-'a-Vur the sake עַמּ֥וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo for his people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel's ס sa-Mek

וַיִּקַּח֩ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David ע֜וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od more פִּֽלַגְשִׁ֤ים <S%H6370><s%> pi-lag-Shim [him] more concubines וְנָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> ve-na-Shim and wives מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> mi-Ru-sha-Lim, out of Jerusalem אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after בֹּא֣וֹ <S%H935><s%> bo-'O he was come מֵחֶבְר֑וֹן <S%H2275><s%> me-chev-Ron; from Hebron וַיִּוָּ֥לְדוּ <S%H3205><s%> vai-yiv-Val-du born ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od and more לְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid to David בָּנִ֥ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim and there were yet sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> u-va-Not. and daughters

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh, now these שְׁמ֛וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot And these [be] the names הַיִּלֹּדִ֥ים <S%H3209><s%> hai-yil-lo-Dim of those that were born ל֖וֹ lo בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; unto him in Jerusalem שַׁמּ֣וּעַ <S%H8051><s%> sham-Mu-a' Shammua וְשׁוֹבָ֔ב <S%H7727><s%> ve-sho-Vav, and Shobab וְנָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> ve-na-Tan and Nathan וּשְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> u-she-lo-Moh. and Solomon
וְיִבְחָ֥ר <S%H2984><s%> ve-yiv-Char Ibhar וֶאֱלִישׁ֖וּעַ <S%H474><s%> ve-'e-li-Shu-a' also and Elishua וְנֶ֥פֶג <S%H5298><s%> ve-Ne-feg and Nepheg וְיָפִֽיעַ׃ <S%H3309><s%> ve-ya-Fi-a'. and Japhia
וֶאֱלִישָׁמָ֥ע <S%H476><s%> ve-'e-li-sha-Ma' And Elishama וְאֶלְיָדָ֖ע <S%H450><s%> ve-'el-ya-Da' and Eliada וֶאֱלִיפָֽלֶט׃ <S%H467><s%> ve-'e-li-Fa-let. and Eliphalet פ Peh
